name: Escape (itch) (Mienfeu)
description:
Step into the shoes of a secret agent!

Intrude into a secret site that is littered with guards patrolling each path. Sneak past them, find the laptop you are seeking, & escape! Be prepared to face challenges as the level progresses & complete your mission to prove that you belong!

Escape has two playable characters with different powers, mazes, increasing difficulty levels, & two unique playable modes to ensure that players have an enjoyable playing experience!

Note: This game was developed as a part of a university project & may be updated with time.
